# Accessing RLHub Data

RLHub is the Experiment Hub for the RLSuite toolchain. It contains annotations
of R-Loop consensus regions and genomic features directly relevant to R-loops, 
such as R-loop-forming sequencing (RLFS) and G-or-C skew regions.

In the below example, we show how one can download this dataset from 
ExperimentHub.

```{r get-rlhub}
library(ExperimentHub)
eh <- ExperimentHub()
query(eh , "RLHub")
```

One can then extract the data for this using

```{r download-rlhub}
rlhub_data <- eh[["EH1"]]
```

The different data types can be accessed with --

```{r rlhub-types}
head(availableData(rlhub_data))
```
